interpretation:
The flag of South Sudan represents a nation that gained its independence after a long and difficult struggle. This card signifies the importance of unity and the power of hope in the face of adversity. It reminds us that pride in one's culture and identity can be a driving force for positive change. 

When this card appears in a reading, it may indicate that the seeker is facing a difficult challenge that requires perseverance and determination. It encourages the seeker to draw upon their inner strength and to seek support from their community. 

The flag of South Sudan also represents the importance of standing up for what one believes in, even when it may be unpopular or risky. It is a reminder that true freedom and independence come at a cost, but the rewards are worth the struggle. 

Overall, this card represents the hope and promise of a new beginning, as well as the challenges that come with creating a new path. It encourages the seeker to stay true to their values and to keep their eyes on the prize, no matter how difficult the journey may be.
